attributes.action: Require all TVs sold in the UK to have a hard power switch that actually turns the device OFF.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I can't actually believe that this isn't already a law or directive of some sort, but it surprises me greatly to see some large screen HDTVs on sale in 2009, that do not have a true power switch from which to turn them off properly! Standby alone is not enough, and I would encourage the banning of that "feature" too if it wasn't already the topic of other past petitions.
